pe5:11.1: Paññā ca sati ca nāmarūpassa kho tassa bhagavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgamma katthetaṃ upasammati →  paññā ceva sati ca, (iccāyasmā ajito)
pe5:19.1: “Yo ve na byathati →  na vedhati (sī1), na byāthati (ka-ma)
pe5:29.14: Navavidhaṃ mānaṃ mānassa → navavidhaṃ mānaṃ vidhāmānassa (bj) | nava mānaṃ vidhamānassa (pts1, mr)
pe5:47.3: hoti, no vāgataṃ na paribhāsati → no vā na paribhāsati (pts1) | na tāvāyaṃ paribhāsi (mr)
pe5:76.5: Yathā kiṃ, yā bhikkhūnaṃ → yo bhikkhu (bj) | yā bhikkhu (pts1), vattato → nivattato (bj, pts1)
pe5:80.1: hāravibhaṅgo nāma →  etthantare pāṭho sī potthake
